Auto-Guard.Description: Enables the ability to automatically block attacks (when blocking is possible and your weapon is drawn).

Dragon Atk Down.Description: Decreases the power of Dragon attacks and Dragon shots (Dragon S).

Gathering -1.Description: Sometimes lowers the number of times items can be gathered at Gathering Points.

Punishing Draw.Description: Grants ability to Stun monsters with draw attacks from cutting weapons and slightly increases Attack.

Recovery Down.Description: Decreases the efficacy of Health recovery items.

Recovery Spd -2.Description: Greatly slows recovery from temporary damage (the red portion of the Health Gauge).

Thunder Atk Down.Description: Decreases the power of Thunder attacks and Thunder shots (Thunder S).

Good Luck.Description: Sometimes increases the number of Reward Items received at the end of a Quest.

Acrobat.Description: Slows Stamina depletion when blocking, evading, or dive-evading. Increases evasion invulnerability.

Latent Power +2.Description: Greatly empowers you for a limited time when certain conditions are met.

Sneak.Description: Decreases the likelihood of being targeted by monsters.

Latent Power +1.Description: Empowers you for a limited time when certain conditions are met.

Double Stun.Description: Makes it harder to recover from being Stunned.

Recovery Spd +1.Description: Speeds recovery from temporary damage (the red portion of the Health Gauge).

Evasion Down.Description: Reduces the invulnerability period when evading.

Taunt.Description: Increases the likelihood of being targeted by monsters.

Earplugs.Description: Negates the effects of some large monsters' roars.

Combination +20%.Description: Increases your Combination success rate by 20%.

Use Lv1 Crag S.Description: Allows Lv1 Crag shots (Crag S) to be loaded.

Silver Bullet.Description: Increases the power of Normal, Pierce and Pellet shots, and Rapid, Pierce and Spread-type arrows.

Fire Atk +2.Description: Greatly increases the power of Fire attacks and Flaming shots (Flaming S).

Honey Hunter.Description: Allows you to gather two Honeys at once.

Item Use Up.Description: Increases the effect time of certain items.

Status Crit.Description: Increases abnormal status attack potency (Sleep, Blast, Poison, Paralysis) of your critical hits.

Evasion +2.Description: Extends the invulnerability period when evading.

Guard -1.Description: Decreases the likelihood of standing your ground when blocking an attack.

Mushromancer.Description: Allows consumption of mushrooms and grants certain benefits as a result.

Use Any Crag S.Description: Allows all levels of Crag shots (Crag S) to be loaded.

Thunder Atk +3.Description: Massively increases the power of Thunder attacks and Thunder shots (Thunder S).

Use C.Range Coat.Description: Allows Close-range coatings to be set when equipped with a Bow.

Awaken.Description: Skills that release the latent elemental properties in some weapons that don't have elements.

Horrible Luck.Description: Often decreases the number of Reward Items received at the end of a Quest.

Thunder Atk +2.Description: Greatly increases the power of Thunder attacks and Thunder shots (Thunder S).

Combination -20%.Description: Decreases your Combination success rate by 20%.

Fire Atk +3.Description: Massively increases the power of Fire attacks and Flaming shots (Flaming S).

Evasion +1.Description: Slightly extends the invulnerability period when evading.

Constitution -1.Description: Speeds up Stamina depletion when evading, blocking, etc.

Evasion +3.Description: Greatly extends the invulnerability period when evading.

Thunder Atk +1.Description: Increases the power of Thunder attacks and Thunder shots (Thunder S).

Knockout King.Description: Makes it easier to Stun monsters.

Benediction.Description: Increases the efficacy of Health recovery items and may decrease damage taken.

Pro Transporter.Description: Increases your speed while transporting items and decreases the likelihood of dropping them.

Constitution +1.Description: Slows Stamina depletion when evading/blocking. Enables dive-evade in any direction.

Iron Wall.Description: Increases your Defense and negates the effects of Defense Down.

Tremor Res.Description: Prevents staggering from tremors created by large monsters.

Dragon Atk +1.Description: Increases the power of Dragon attacks and Dragon shots (Dragon S).

Gathering +2.Description: Often raises the number of times items can be gathered at Gathering Points.

Distraction.Description: Slows charge of L. Sword/S. Axe/ D. Blades gauges, C. Blade phials, Bow/G. Sword/Hammer charge atks.

Focus.Description: Speeds charge of L. Sword/S. Axe/ D. Blades gauges, C. Blade phials, Bow/G. Sword/Hammer charge atks.

Recovery Spd -1.Description: Slows recovery from temporary damage (the red portion of the Health Gauge).

Constitution +2.Description: Greatly slows Stamina depletion when evading/blocking. Enables dive-evade in any direction.

HG Earplugs.Description: Negates the effects of all large monsters' roars.

Constitution -2.Description: Greatly speeds up Stamina depletion when evading, blocking, etc.

Wrath Awoken.Description: At higher Health, grants Guts effects; at lower Health, boosts Attack and Defense.

Recovery Up.Description: Increases the efficacy of Health recovery items.

Explosive Trapper.Description: Increases bomb/Blast damage, bomb- and trap-setting speed, and Combination success rate.

Rodeo God.Description: Makes it easier to mount and successfully topple a monster.

Horn Maestro.Description: Decreases the likelihood of Horn items breaking, and increases the effect time of Hunting Horn melodies.

Short Sprinter.Description: Speeds up Stamina depletion for actions which continuously drain Stamina (such as dashing).

Guard +2.Description: Greatly increases the likelihood of standing your ground when blocking an attack.

Autotracker.Description: Always displays large monsters on the Map, as if they were marked.

Use Blast Coat.Description: Allows Blast coatings to be set when equipped with a Bow.

Fire Atk Down.Description: Decreases the power of Fire attacks and Flaming shots (Flaming S).

Pack Rat.Description: Raises number of items that can be gathered at Gathering Points. Allows mining 2 Charms at once... Maybe.

Fleet Feet.Description: Increases evade distance, and also increases Attack when your Health Gauge is full.

Windproof (Hi).Description: Negates Wind Pressure from almost all monsters.

Mounting Master.Description: Makes it much easier to mount and successfully topple a monster.

Saddle Sore.Description: Makes it harder to mount and successfully topple a monster.

Outdoorsman.Description: Improves fishing and cooking results during quests, and always displays the Map, even without the Map item.

Recovery Spd +2.Description: Greatly speeds recovery from temporary damage (the red portion of the Health Gauge).

Use Poison Coat.Description: Allows Poison coatings to be set when equipped with a Bow.

Steady Hand.Description: Prevents your attacks from being deflected and halves the rate at which Sharpness decreases.

Combination +45%.Description: Increases your Combination success rate by 45%.

Double Bleeding.Description: Doubles the damage received from Bleeding.

Halve Stun.Description: Reduces the likelihood of being Stunned by 50%.

Bombardier.Description: Increases bomb damage, and raises the Combination success rate for all bombs to 100%.

Bad Luck.Description: Sometimes decreases the number of Reward Items received at the end of a Quest.

Bloodthirst.Description: Speeds up gauges/charged attacks. Can eat Raw Meat, and Steaks temporarily grant unlimited Stamina.

Cold Surge.Description: Increases the speed at which your maximum Stamina depletes from cold.

Pierce/Pierce Up.Description: Increases the power of Pierce shots (Pierce S) and Pierce-type arrows.

Weakness Exploit.Description: Increases damage when striking body parts upon which your attacks are highly effective.

Dragon Atk +2.Description: Greatly increases the power of Dragon attacks and Dragon shots (Dragon S).

Use Lv1 Pierce S.Description: Allows Lv1 Pierce shots (Pierce S) to be loaded.

Detect.Description: Increases the information displayed on the Map when large monsters are marked.

Load Up.Description: Increases Bowguns and Gunlance ammo capacity, C. Blade phials, and charge attack capacity of Bows.

Dragon Atk +3.Description: Massively increases the power of Dragon attacks and Dragon shots (Dragon S).

Gathering God.Description: Very often raises the number of times items can be gathered at Gathering Points.

Pro Dirty Fencer.Description: Ups power every time you faint. Lowers certain actions' stamina cost. Boosts Exhaust effects.

Item Use Down.Description: Decreases the effect time of certain items.

Miraculous Luck.Description: Very often increases the number of Reward Items received at the end of a Quest.

Fire Atk +1.Description: Increases the power of Fire attacks and Flaming shots (Flaming S).

Marathon Runner.Description: Slows down Stamina depletion for actions which continuously drain Stamina (such as dashing).

Combination -10%.Description: Decreases your Combination success rate by 10%.

Critical Eye +4.Description: Warning: This skill does not exist in the game but is still present in the game data.

Great Luck.Description: Often increases the number of Reward Items received at the end of a Quest.

Gathering +1.Description: Sometimes raises the number of times items can be gathered at Gathering Points.

Meat Lover.Description: Allows consumption of Raw Meat, plus Rare and Well-done Steaks temporarily grant unlimited Stamina.

Use Sleep Coat.Description: Allows Sleep coatings to be set when equipped with a Bow.

Palico Rally.Description: Increases the Attack and Defense of Palicoes.

Use Any Pierce S.Description: Allows all levels of Pierce shots (Pierce S) to be loaded.

Use Slicing S.Description: Allows Slicing shots (Slicing S) to be loaded.

Peak Performance.Description: Increases Attack when your Health Gauge is full.

Guard +1.Description: Increases the likelihood of standing your ground when blocking an attack.

Guard Up.Description: Skills that cause previously unblockable attacks to become blockable.

Honed Blade.Description: Skills that increase Attack and raise Sharpness. (Blademaster Only).
